attributes.action: stop city centre shops leaving their lights on 24/7 in order to save energy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Big companies with shops in town centres leave internal and external lights on 24 hours a day. Although singularly this may not take up much energy, overall a lot of energy is being wasted by companies doing this all over the UK. It is clear that leaving lighting on is a security measure but there are many other ways to keep shops secure without wasting energy.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
